question: Hey, how's it going?
cust_r2: Hey, I asked a question, bud! Don't ignore me!

question: You always have the best deals!
r1: Here at Face Value, we gotchu! *grin*
cust_r1: Haha, you really got that customer service smile, huh?
r2: Actually, Wise Guise has better deals...
cust_r2: Wait, seriously? Thanks for the tip!

question: I can't believe you had this!
r1: I can't believe we had this either!
r2: We're the only ones in the West End that's got it!
cust_r2: I'll def have to come back for more, thanks!

question: You really saved my chrome.
r2: At Face Value, we've got all you need and more!
cust_r2: Thank ya! I can go to the party dressed up real nice now.

question: I gotta tell my crew about this place!
r1: Let them know we got the best deals in the West End!
cust_r1: Yeah, they'll be here with all the chips! Rad.
r2: You should really tell them about Wise Guise instead. They have better stock.
cust_r2: Yo, sayin' that kinda stuff is gonna get ya in trouble with your boss, no?
